adDetails: Bonjour, Would you like to learn French quickly with a complete method, combining extensive practice and concise explanations of all the grammar topics? I was born in Paris, I'm a professional French tutor, and I have been teaching French in the Bay Area since 1995. My rate for one-on-one teaching is $20 per hour. Feel free to email me for further information. Merci et à bientôt.
